text.headline: Rolling Sands
text.text: Rolling Sands Golf Course Major Final Site Plan application to Martin County, Florida - Request by Creech Consulting, Inc. on behalf of SS Ranch, LLC for permit approval of a Major Final Site Plan to develop an 18-hole private golf course using golf course architect Tom Doak. The project includes a one-story clubhouse, pro shop, maintenance building, two cottages, a helicopter pad. The filing outlines a proposal to reconfigure 20 acres of the approximate 240-acre property to retain as a residential lot. The property is located between Okeechobee Waterway (aka St. Lucie Canal) and SW Kanner Highway approximately 6.5 miles west of Interstate 95.
